ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II SLR Zoom Lens
Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens - Opteka EF-790 DG E-TTL II LCD Flash
Opteka OPT540 54" Compact Tripod w/ Bonus Carry Case - Transcend 16GB Class 10 SDHC Memory Card
LP-E8 2000mAh Battery - Microfiber Deluxe Carrying Case - 58mm Ultra Violet UV Filter
Opteka HD Pro 5 Piece Filter Kit - 0.43x & 2.2x Lens Kit, Memory Card Wallet, RC-4 Remote, Lens Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens with Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens with 13 Piece Deluxe Accessory Kit
